name: columnValueLengthsToBeBetween
displayName: Column Value Lengths To Be Between
description: This schema defines the test ColumnValueLengthsToBeBetween. Test the value lengths in a column to be between minimum and maximum value.

parameterDefinition.name: minLength
parameterDefinition.description: The {minLength} for the column length. If minLength is not included, maxLength is treated as upperBound and there will be no minimum number of rows

parameterDefinition.name: maxLength
parameterDefinition.description: The {maxLength} for the column length. if maxLength is not included, minLength is treated as lowerBound and there will eb no maximum number of rows
